note.p: Founded in 1872 by Anton Dohrn. First building completed, 1873; aquarium, 1874; second building 1885–8, courtyard and western part, 1905. Rented ‘research tables’ to international institutions and individuals to carry out scientific research.
Stazione Zoologica Anton Dohrn Napoli, http://www.szn.it/index.php/en/who-we-are/our-history (accessed 22 March 2018)
